verses.verse: Yet now <S%H8085>hear<s%>, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>; and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom I have <S%H977>chosen<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H6213>made<s%> thee, and <S%H3335>formed<s%> thee from the <S%H990>womb<s%>, which will <S%H5826>help<s%> thee; <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, my <S%H5650>servant<s%>; and thou, <S%H3484>Jesurun<s%>, whom I have <S%H977>chosen<s%>.

For I will <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> upon him that is <S%H6771>thirsty<s%>, and <S%H5140>floods<s%> upon the dry <S%H3004>ground<s%>: I will <S%H3332>pour<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> upon thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and my <S%H1293>blessing<s%> upon thine <S%H6631>offspring<s%>:
And they shall spring <S%H6779>up<s%> as <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H2682>grass<s%>, as <S%H6155>willows<s%> by the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H2988>courses<s%>.

One shall <S%H559>say<s%>, I am the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%>; and another shall <S%H7121>call<s%> himself by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>; and another shall <S%H3789>subscribe<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H3655>surname<s%> himself by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and his <S%H1350>redeemer<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; I am the <S%H7223>first<s%>, and I am the <S%H314>last<s%>; and <S%H1107>beside<s%> me there is no <S%H430>God<s%>.

And who, as I, shall <S%H7121>call<s%>, and shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> it, and set it in <S%H6186>order<s%> for me, since I <S%H7760>appointed<s%> the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>? and the things that are <S%H857>coming<s%>, and shall <S%H935>come<s%>, let them <S%H5046>shew<s%> unto them.

<S%H6342>Fear<s%> ye not, neither be <S%H7297>afraid<s%> <S%H7297><s%>: have not I <S%H8085>told<s%> thee from that <S%H227>time<s%>, and have <S%H5046>declared<s%> it? ye are even my <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>. Is <S%H3426>there<s%> a <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H1107>beside<s%> me? yea, there is no <S%H6697>God<s%>; I <S%H3045>know<s%> not any. God; I: Heb. rock, etc

They that <S%H3335>make<s%> a graven <S%H6459>image<s%> are all of them <S%H8414>vanity<s%>; and their delectable <S%H2530>things<s%> shall not <S%H3276>profit<s%>; and they are their own <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>; they <S%H7200>see<s%> not, nor <S%H3045>know<s%>; that they may be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>. delectable: Heb. desirable
Who hath <S%H3335>formed<s%> a <S%H410>god<s%>, or <S%H5258>molten<s%> a graven <S%H6459>image<s%> that is <S%H3276>profitable<s%> for <S%H1115>nothing<s%>?

Behold, all his <S%H2270>fellows<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>: and the <S%H2796>workmen<s%>, they are of <S%H120>men<s%>: let them all be gathered <S%H6908>together<s%>, let them stand <S%H5975>up<s%>; yet they shall <S%H6342>fear<s%>, and they shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

The <S%H1270>smith<s%> <S%H2796><s%> with the <S%H4621>tongs<s%> both <S%H6466>worketh<s%> in the <S%H6352>coals<s%>, and <S%H3335>fashioneth<s%> it with <S%H4717>hammers<s%>, and <S%H6466>worketh<s%> it with the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of his <S%H2220>arms<s%>: yea, he is <S%H7457>hungry<s%>, and his <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H369>faileth<s%>: he <S%H8354>drinketh<s%> no <S%H4325>water<s%>, and is <S%H3286>faint<s%>. with the tongs: or, with an axe

The <S%H2796>carpenter<s%> <S%H6086><s%> stretcheth <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H6957>rule<s%>; he marketh it <S%H8388>out<s%> with a <S%H8279>line<s%>; he <S%H6213>fitteth<s%> it with <S%H4741>planes<s%>, and he marketh it <S%H8388>out<s%> with the <S%H4230>compass<s%>, and <S%H6213>maketh<s%> it after the <S%H8403>figure<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>, according to the <S%H8597>beauty<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>; that it may <S%H3427>remain<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

He heweth him <S%H3772>down<s%> <S%H730>cedars<s%>, and <S%H3947>taketh<s%> the <S%H8645>cypress<s%> and the <S%H437>oak<s%>, which he <S%H553>strengtheneth<s%> for himself among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>: he <S%H5193>planteth<s%> an <S%H766>ash<s%>, and the <S%H1653>rain<s%> doth <S%H1431>nourish<s%> it. strengtheneth: or, taketh courage

Then shall it be for a <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H1197>burn<s%>: for he will <S%H3947>take<s%> thereof, and <S%H2552>warm<s%> himself; yea, he <S%H5400>kindleth<s%> it, and <S%H644>baketh<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>; yea, he <S%H6466>maketh<s%> a <S%H410>god<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshippeth<s%> it; he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> it a graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, and falleth <S%H5456>down<s%> thereto.

He <S%H8313>burneth<s%> <S%H2677>part<s%> thereof <S%H1119>in<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>; with <S%H2677>part<s%> thereof he <S%H398>eateth<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; he <S%H6740>roasteth<s%> <S%H6748>roast<s%>, and is <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>: yea, he <S%H2552>warmeth<s%> himself, and <S%H559>saith<s%>, <S%H1889>Aha<s%>, I am <S%H2552>warm<s%>, I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H217>fire<s%>:

And the <S%H7611>residue<s%> thereof he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> a <S%H410>god<s%>, even his graven <S%H6459>image<s%>: he falleth <S%H5456>down<s%> unto it, and <S%H7812>worshippeth<s%> it, and <S%H6419>prayeth<s%> unto it, and <S%H559>saith<s%>, <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me; for thou art my <S%H410>god<s%>.

They have not <S%H3045>known<s%> nor <S%H995>understood<s%>: for he hath <S%H2902>shut<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, that they cannot <S%H7200>see<s%>; and their <S%H3826>hearts<s%>, that they cannot <S%H7919>understand<s%>. shut: Heb. daubed

And none <S%H7725>considereth<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, neither is there <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> nor <S%H8394>understanding<s%> to <S%H559>say<s%>, I have <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H2677>part<s%> of it <S%H1119>in<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>; yea, also I have <S%H644>baked<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> upon the <S%H1513>coals<s%> thereof; I have <S%H6740>roasted<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and <S%H398>eaten<s%> it: and shall I <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H3499>residue<s%> thereof an <S%H8441>abomination<s%>? shall I fall <S%H5456>down<s%> to the <S%H944>stock<s%> of a <S%H6086>tree<s%>? considereth: Heb. setteth to his heart the stock: Heb. that which comes of a tree?

He <S%H7462>feedeth<s%> on <S%H665>ashes<s%>: a <S%H2048>deceived<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> hath turned him <S%H5186>aside<s%>, that he cannot <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%>, nor <S%H559>say<s%>, Is there not a <S%H8267>lie<s%> in my right <S%H3225>hand<s%>?

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> these, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for thou art my <S%H5650>servant<s%>: I have <S%H3335>formed<s%> thee; thou art my <S%H5650>servant<s%>: O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, thou shalt not be <S%H5382>forgotten<s%> of me.

I have blotted <S%H4229>out<s%>, as a thick <S%H5645>cloud<s%>, thy <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>, and, as a <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, thy <S%H2403>sins<s%>: <S%H7725>return<s%> unto me; for I have <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> thee.

<S%H7442>Sing<s%>, O ye <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> it: <S%H7321>shout<s%>, ye lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing<s%>, ye <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, O <S%H3293>forest<s%>, and every <S%H6086>tree<s%> therein: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H6286>glorified<s%> himself in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thy <S%H1350>redeemer<s%>, and he that <S%H3335>formed<s%> thee from the <S%H990>womb<s%>, I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H6213>maketh<s%> all things; that stretcheth <S%H5186>forth<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> alone; that spreadeth <S%H7554>abroad<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by myself;

That <S%H6565>frustrateth<s%> the <S%H226>tokens<s%> of the <S%H907>liars<s%>, and maketh <S%H7080>diviners<s%> <S%H1984>mad<s%>; that <S%H7725>turneth<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> men <S%H268>backward<s%>, and maketh their <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H5528>foolish<s%>;

That <S%H6965>confirmeth<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and <S%H7999>performeth<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of his <S%H4397>messengers<s%>; that <S%H559>saith<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, Thou shalt be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>; and to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, Ye shall be <S%H1129>built<s%>, and I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the decayed <S%H2723>places<s%> thereof: decayed: Heb. wastes
That <S%H559>saith<s%> to the <S%H6683>deep<s%>, Be <S%H2717>dry<s%>, and I will dry <S%H3001>up<s%> thy <S%H5104>rivers<s%>:

That <S%H559>saith<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%>, He is my <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>, and shall <S%H7999>perform<s%> all my <S%H2656>pleasure<s%>: even <S%H559>saying<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, Thou shalt be <S%H1129>built<s%>; and to the <S%H1964>temple<s%>, Thy foundation shall be <S%H3245>laid<s%>.
